title: GxSTxV
author: GxSTxV
content: I had an experience that made me think about why everyone should choose instant withdrawal casinos I’m sure there are many reasons for that but for my experience where i was gambling in a not instant withdrawal casino.I played some slots and won good amount of money so i requested to withdraw all of it right away. After 24 hours my orders still pending so i contacted the support to cancel the request ( which was so dumb from me Xd).After playing again i lost all that balance and i was thinking if i was in an instant withdrawal casino this scenario wouldn’t happen even that it was totally my fault ( and please no need to mention that again ) In your opinion why you should choose instant withdrawal casino instead of regular ones that can take days to receive your winnings?

I believe they were simply buying time to delay payment since they may not have enough funds or they were waiting for you to continue playing and lose your money as has already happened.Quote from: GxSTxV on May 26, 2023, 11:55:07 AMIn your opinion why you should choose instant withdrawal casino instead of regular ones that can take days to receive your winnings?A reputable casino that offers instant withdrawal is what everyone should look for. I believe it's better for both, the casino to process payments quickly (to maintain their reputation and for positives users reviews) and for a gambler to avoid becoming greedy and playing more when already requesting a withdrawal.

In my case, I use Bitcoin as means of gambling and I also withdraw it on that method paying 7k satoshis in Stake.com and after 3-5 minutes I will already see an incoming fund alert on my wallet. For example, you win more after the withdrawal and you want to add more funds to the withdrawal amount, then you could cancel it and make it one transaction.

comments.author: Dr.Bitcoin_Strange
comments.body: Most So-called casinos always experience this kind of issue you just talked about, and this doesn't only happen with instant withdrawal; it also happens with instant deposit. In some casinos I have used in the past, sometimes one will make a deposit and it will not reflect in your balance. You will then need to contact support before they can rectify the issue. I got a so much paranoid because of this deposit issues. Why? I was supposed to bet on a match that was supposed to start in an hour, but I made a deposit and did not get it on my balance. I waited until the whole hour was timed up, and I couldn't even bet on the sure odds I had that day. What angered me the most was that the game did not burst; if I had made the bet that day, I would have won the game.But what I realized with the platform is that those delays only occur when people use the fiat option to deposit and withdraw. There are no such delays for the crypto deposit and withdrawal options.So my advice is that if the casino you are using has a different withdrawal option, try to use it. Also, be sure you are dealing with a reputable platform. You can even inquire from support about the best deposit and withdrawal options, which are so fast.
